descbody.para: If a lift must be used for an operation, observe the safety instructionsvehicle : towing and liftingGIEMR-002447.
Protect any bodywork components which could be damaged by brake fluid with covers.
To ensure there is no risk of sparks, do not place any metallic objects on the battery.
Brake fluid is highly corrosive. Carefully clean any brake fluid spilt on parts of the vehicle.
Clean around the braking system using brake cleaner vehicle : parts and consumables for the repairGIEMR-002445.
If a component is being replaced by a new one, do not remove the new component from its packaging until its is ready to be fitted onto the vehicle.

noteR.para: Prepare for the flow of fluid, and protect the surrounding components.

descbody.para: When carrying out an operation that requires the braking circuit to be opened, position apedal presson the brake pedal to limit the outflow of brake fluid.
Following any operation on the ABS, it is essential to confirm the repair by carrying out a road test and a check using theDiagnostic tool.

description.title: YAW SPEED AND LATERAL ACCELERATION SENSOR

descbody.para: The sensor must be fitted facing the vehicle's direction of travel (as shown by the arrow).
Be sure to replace any sensor which has sustained an impact.

noteR.para: Switch off the vehicle ignition so as not to activate the hydraulic unit solenoid valves when bleeding the brake circuit.
To help ensure that rigid brake pipes do not cross over, mark their position in relation to the hydraulic brake unit.
To ensure that the wheel speed sensor works properly, do not mark the sensor target on the bearing.
In order to prevent irreversible damage to the front hub bearing:

ul.li: Do not loosen or tighten the driveshaft nut when the wheels are on the ground.
Do not place the vehicle with its wheels on the ground when the driveshaft has been loosened or removed.

noteR.para: To avoid breaking the connection between the brake servo pushrod and the brake pedal, check that the safety clevis pin is locked onto the brake servo pushrod by tilting it from the top downwards.
